column1: Uchi////Uchi will forever remain a part of my memory as it is the first omakase I've ever tried in HTX. Since then
column2: as a couple we've continued coming here and enjoying a grand night out
column3: blessed with the situation that we had almost no clue what we'd be fed--we just knew we were gonna eat GOOD. With omakase their's always one or two dishes you can say "meh" to
column4: but in the grand scheme of things
column5: Uchi always delivers quite a show and always knocks it out of the park with their tongue flipping pieces of nigiri.
